_comment: Copy this file to mappings.json and configure your projects
_note: mappings.json is in .gitignore - your local config won't be committed

_help.shortcuts: Short aliases for project names (c ep -> c example-project-name)
_help.server_paths: Relative paths to check for server components (for 'c project server')
_help.web_paths: Relative paths to check for web components (for 'c project web')
_help.auto_discovery: Projects in ~/workspaces/ are auto-discovered even without config
